name: Chevron Kiss PDF Pattern
description:
This pattern has two different variations of a quilt.  The first one is a more detailed version with a pieced, chevron panel creating a trendy, sophisticated quilt.  The second version is a more simplified quilt that is understatedly basic for all to enjoy.  I have included layout instructions for baby, twin, and queen sizes.  The quilts that are shown measure approx 40” x 50” finished.  

This is for a PDF file that will be sent to the e-mail associated with your pay pal account.  

For more details check out my blog www.mixiheart.blogspot.com

name: Trendy Doll Diaper Bag PDF Pattern
description:
Every child can enjoy a doll diaper bag or tote bag! They can fill them with items to take care of their cute dolls or little brother/sister! They can also tote toys likes trucks, tools, paper supplies anything the little ones need to carry. This is a trendy diaper bag that is beginner friendly and playfully friendly for the experienced seamstress. 

This is a PDF pattern for the Trendy Doll Diaper Bag. It will be e-mailed to the e-mail associated with your pay pal account. 

This is just for personal use. Replication is prohibited. 

For more details check out my blog - www.mixiheart.blogspot.com

name: Classic Doll Diaper Bag PDF Pattern
description:
Every little girl or boy can enjoy a diaper bag to tote around important items and such to help take care of their cute dolls or little brother/sister! This is a classic diaper bag that is beginner friendly and classically friendly for the experienced seamstress.

This is a PDF pattern that will be e-mailed to the e-mail associated with your pay pal account. 

For more details check out my blog - www.mixiheart.blogspot.com

name: Sweet Diaper Bag PDF Pattern
description:
Every new parent can enjoy a laminated diaper bag or tote bag!  The bag can be filled up with items to take care of the precious new addition(s).   This bag is also versatile as a tote to take to the pool or as an over-night bag when the new addition(s) grow older.  This sweet diaper bag is beginner friendly and playfully friendly for the experienced seamstress. 

This is for an adult-sized diaper bag pdf file that will be e-mailed to the e-mail associated with your pay pal account.  

Thank you so much for your interest! :)

name: Apron Strings PDF Pattern
description:
This pattern has all the essentials for a little one to cook something up in a kitchen.  The first apron portion is super fun to make with a split kangaroo pocket.  The second portion is an oven mitt for all to enjoy.  The third portion is hot pads to make a complete cooking collection.  The last portion is a quick tablecloth to tie everything together.  

This is for a PDF file that will be e-mailed to the e-mail associated with your pay pal account.  

Thank you so much for your interest!:)
